entry.title: Windows usermode hooks - Part 1 - Detection
entry.summary: This post will guide you through how to detect usermode hooks in Windows default libraries and APIs, regardless of whether they have been inserted by AV/EDR products or other third-party software. Introduction It is a well-known phenomena that AV/EDR products or software with similar intent, such as anti-cheat products for games, utilize usermode hooking techniques to monitor the usage of vita...
